Package rekit.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LambdaUtil.ConsumerWithException<I>
    This interface represents a Consumer with Exception.
    LambdaUtil.FunctionWithException<I,O>
    This interface represents a Function with Exception.
    LambdaUtil.RunnableWithException
    This interface represents a Runnable with Exception.
    LambdaUtil.SupplierWithException<O>
    This interface represents a Supplier with Exception.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalcUtil
    This class contains several methods to calculate between units.
    LambdaUtil
    This class contains several methods to work with Lambdas.
    Once
    This class realized a LambdaUtil.RunnableWithException which can executed once.
    ReflectUtils
    This class contains several methods for using Java Reflections in a proper way.
    ThreadUtils
    This class contains several methods for a better usability of Threads.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ReflectUtils.LoadMe
    This annotation has to be applied to Classes which shall be loaded as implementation of a specific class and shall be instantiated.
    If a class wants to be loaded, the class needs a default constructor
